files.patch:
@@ -6258,1 +6258,1 @@
-// for dividend, leftmost 32bits will be in r4 and rightmost 32bits will be in r5 register.
+// for dividend, upper 32bits will be in r4 and lower 32bits will be in r5 register.
@@ -6272,1 +6272,1 @@
-    __ z_lhi(r4_reven_tmp, 0); // make leftmost 32bits 0
+    __ z_lhi(r4_reven_tmp, 0); // make upper 32bits 0
@@ -6337,1 +6337,1 @@
-// for dividend, leftmost 64bits will be in r4 and rightmost 64bits will be in r5 register.
+// for dividend, upper 64bits will be in r4 and lower 64bits will be in r5 register.
@@ -6350,1 +6350,1 @@
-    __ z_lghi(r4_reven_tmp, 0); // make leftmost 64bits 0
+    __ z_lghi(r4_reven_tmp, 0); // make upper 64bits 0
@@ -6424,1 +6424,1 @@
-// for dividend, leftmost 32bits will be in r4 and rightmost 32bits will be in r5 register.
+// for dividend, upper 32bits will be in r4 and lower 32bits will be in r5 register.
@@ -6439,2 +6439,2 @@
-    __ z_lr(r5_rodd_tmp, r4_reven_dst); // load rightmost 32bits in odd register
-    __ z_lhi(r4_reven_dst, 0);          // make leftmost  32bits 0
+    __ z_lr(r5_rodd_tmp, r4_reven_dst); // load lower 32bits in odd register
+    __ z_lhi(r4_reven_dst, 0);          // make upper 32bits 0
@@ -6512,1 +6512,1 @@
-// for dividend, leftmost 64bits will be in r4 and rightmost 64bits will be in r5 register.
+// for dividend, upper 64bits will be in r4 and lower 64bits will be in r5 register.
@@ -6527,2 +6527,2 @@
-    __ z_lgr(r5_rodd_tmp, r4_reven_dst); // load rightmost 64bits in even register
-    __ z_lghi(r4_reven_dst, 0);          // make leftmost 64bits 0
+    __ z_lgr(r5_rodd_tmp, r4_reven_dst); // load lower 64bits in even register
+    __ z_lghi(r4_reven_dst, 0);          // make upper 64bits 0
